text: For example, if we suspend an Learning Loop Mentoring Account for fraud or safety reasons, we may retain information from that Learning Loop Mentoring Account to prevent that Member from opening a new Learning Loop Mentoring Account in the future.
We store the account information you provided as well as email and mobile phone numbers for marketing purposes.

If you request erasure of your personal information, please note the following: We may retain your personal information as necessary for our legitimate business interests, such as prevention of money laundering, fraud detection and prevention, and enhancing safety.

When a mentee books a mentor, the Learning Loop Mentoring platform application creates a calendar event through the preferred calendar integration of the mentor (Google Calendar API or the Microsoft Outlook Graph API) on the behalf of the mentor and also includes and shares the requesting mentee email with the mentor through the created calendar event, where the mentee is a participant.

data_type: start- not specific detail about event
text: The Learning Loop Mentoring platform application frequently requests to read all calendar events in the mentors calendar 1,5 months ahead, but only reads and stores the start- and end-times of mentor calendar events, not specific details about the events. Start- and end-times of mentor calendar events are stored (cached) in the Learning Loop Mentoring platform database - on a secured server and transferred over a secured connection and is not shared with fourth parties.
